title: Sans and a serif from Daniel Calderwood
content:
Trying to identify these two fonts from Daniel Calderwoods beautiful [Magic Ladders](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417074744/http:/www.danielcalderwood.com/magicladders) project.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Screen Shot 2014-03-05 at 11.34.21.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417074744/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot%202014-03-05%20at%2011.34.21.png) | 77.25 KB |
| [Screen Shot 2014-03-05 at 11.32.24.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417074744/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot%202014-03-05%20at%2011.32.24.png) | 136.54 KB |
author: Captain Kidd

comments.content: The sans is [Circular LL](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417074744/http:/lineto.com/The+Fonts/Font+Categories/Text+Fonts/Circular) by Laurenz Brunner for Lineto.
Thanks Ryuk, thats it alright, any ideas about the serif font?
